node.excerpt: Intro Java 8 introduced the Stream API, with functional-like operations for processing sequences. If you want to read more about it, have a look at this article. In this quick article, we'll see how to convert a  String  to a  Stream  of single characters. Conversion Using chars() The  String  APIâ€¦
